comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I got up onto lower McClintock trail today. Nice and cool in the woods. Next week, Four Pines. Yahoo! On my way back across campus I ran into my buddy Doug from Physics. He's at week eight on crutches, the result of a pack crash and a shattered hip. Holy cow... I don't feel so bad about my little zip 'n strip at BCH now. Poor guy. DY
